string.text:
Action Plan for Military

Personnel: 
Commander operations: signal "Quartet" 
 Seven landing assault troops: "Peregrine" "Kite" "Hawk" "Kestrel " "Harrier" "Accipiter" "Vulture". 
Sniper calculation: "Owl" 
Support: 
Air: "Zero 18th " " 30th zero "" Zero 31st" "Forty-eighth" "49th" "half a second" 
first half a "Sixty-four" "Sixty-five" "zero ninety-eight" zero ninety-seventh "
Land: "Battleship-1" "Battleship-2" "Battleship-3" 
Situation: Perhaps a strong resistance in the bridge (23,45), the gate (26.78), the road along the main building of the station (12,23-53,76). Probably the use of heavy weapons by the enemy.
Expected number of enemy 70 - 100. The presence of armored vehicles - no.
Maybe heavy sniper cover from the enemy.
Weather: Visibility - 700, there may be a previously unknown anomaly.
